author: fern
description:
Get started with Odoo, try a free 15-day trial and level up your quality of work: https://www.odoo.com/r/WBv0 (ad)

Who will win the battle for succession in the Murdoch family and take control of the world's most powerful media empire?

Our research is based on the following sources, among others:
“You’ve Blown a Hole in the Family,” by Jonathan Mahler and Jim Rutenberg for the New York Times: https://www.nytimes.com/2025/02/13/magazine/rupert-murdoch-succession-family-trust-fight.html

“Growing Up Murdoch,” by McKay Coppins for The Atlantic: https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2025/04/rupert-murdoch-family-succession-james-murdoch/681675/
“Anna and Her Kingdom,” by David Leser for Australian Women’s Weekly: https://davidleser.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Anna-Murdoch.pdf 

“The Boy Who Wouldn’t Be King,” by Steve Fishman for New York magazine: https://nymag.com/nymetro/news/media/features/14302/ 

“How Rupert Murdoch’s Empire of Influence Remade the World,” by Jonathan Ma
title: The Battle for the Fox Media Empire
